content:
I had a cute idea for using the LSP "signature help" that pops up when editing a function call to also provide help when writing generic parameters (triggering on < in addition to (). It would show the generic parameter names and bounds, and potentially docs of the generic type. Do y'all think this is a good idea or no?

(we might have to handle lifetimes and const parameters a bit better before this has good enough UX though)
:thumbs_up:
